response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value to me, but I believe it would be an even greater asset in your hands. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to see it go to someone who will appreciate it fully. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 900000}
